entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 1:36 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SW 37 km/h gust 54 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
